title: Adidas
description: Adidas is a global sportswear brand known for its bold and dynamic color palette. The primary brand colors include Black (#000000) and White (#FFFFFF), symbolizing classic and clean design. Additionally, accent colors like Red (#BE0027), Gold (#CF8D2E), and Lime Green (#E4E932) are used to add vibrancy and energy, reflecting its athletic identity. These colors are available for reference from the Adidas branding guideline available online.
